en.title: How to Use example.ai
en.description: Follow these simple steps to get started with our AI-powered platform

steps.title: Sign Up
steps.description: Create your account in just a few clicks. No credit card required for the free trial.

steps.title: Connect Your Data
steps.description: Securely integrate your existing systems and data sources with our platform.

steps.title: Configure Your Workflow
steps.description: Customize your AI models and automation workflows to match your specific needs.

steps.title: Train Your Models
steps.description: Upload your training data and let our AI learn from your specific use case.

steps.title: Monitor Performance
steps.description: Track your AI's performance with real-time analytics and insights.

steps.title: Scale Automatically
steps.description: Our platform automatically scales to handle growing data volumes and user demands.

zh.title: 如何使用 example.ai
zh.description: 按照以下简单步骤开始使用我们的AI驱动平台

steps.title: 注册账号
steps.description: 只需点击几下即可创建您的账户。免费试用无需信用卡。

steps.title: 连接数据
steps.description: 安全地将您现有的系统和数据源与我们的平台集成。

steps.title: 配置工作流
steps.description: 根据您的具体需求自定义AI模型和自动化工作流。

steps.title: 训练模型
steps.description: 上传您的训练数据，让我们的AI从您的特定用例中学习。

steps.title: 监控性能
steps.description: 通过实时分析和洞察跟踪您的AI性能。

steps.title: 自动扩展
steps.description: 我们的平台会自动扩展以处理不断增长的数据量和用户需求。
